text: Julian Galilea Martinez de Pinillos (born September 17, 1966 in La Rioja) is a 7-per-team football player from Spain. He has a disability: he has cerebral palsy and is a C7 type player. He played 7-per-team football at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team, Spain, played the United States national 7-per- team football team and won 2-1. His team finished third. == References == Category:Spanish footballers Category:Living people Category:1978 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:People from La Rioja Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type C7
title: Julian Galilea Martinez de Pinillos
